name: SUPERMOONS
description:
This one is about bouncing moons around in a forest. There are wind chimes.

CREDITS: 

THE MOONS AND TORCHES WERE MADE IN "ROSACE," A CIRCLE GENERATOR BY TITOUAN MILLET THE BACKGROUNDS WERE MADE IN "BECOME A GREAT ARIST IN JUST 10 SECONDS!" BY ANDI MCCLURE AND MICHAEL BROUGH

THE WIND SOUND IS COURTESY OF BIRMINGHAM YOUNG UNIVERSITY http://students.cs.byu.edu/~cbeacham/Virtual%20Zo...

THE FIRE SOUND IS COURTESY OF PARTNERS IN RHYME http://students.cs.byu.edu/~cbeacham/Virtual%20Zo...
